summary.span: 提供設計工具，這個工具可讓您以視覺化的方式設計複合活動。

span.span: Provides a designer that enables you to visually design composite activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 您可使用 以視覺化的方式設計複合活動、自訂配置，以及管理 的繪製。Use the to visually design composite activities, to customize the layout, and to manage the drawing of the . 也可讓您管理包含之活動設計工具的事件，The also enables you to manage events for the contained activity designers. 並且自訂和管理包含之活動設計工具的位置、大小和配置。It also enables you to customize and manage the position, size, and layout of contained activity designers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用指定的 載入設計工具。 loads the designer with the specified . 設計工具會載入活動服務、更新與活動相關聯的動詞，以及為設計工具指派預設文字和影像。The designer loads the activity service, updates the verbs associated with the activity, and assigns the default text and image to the designer.

param.name: e
param.span: ，其中包含事件資料。

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 當指標在設計工具界限內且點選滑鼠時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the mouse is clicked when the pointer is in designer bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 如果設計工具為有效的置放目標 (Drop Target)，則會以指定的拖放效果引發 事件。If the designer is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. - 系統會追蹤指標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕的變更。Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出設計工具中繫結，則會引發 事件。If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入其他設計工具，則會引發該設計工具的 。If the mouse enters another designer, the for that designer is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是仍在相同的設計工具內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the event is raised. - 如果鍵盤或滑鼠狀態變更，便會引發 事件，並根據事件 `Action`的 屬性值決定要繼續拖曳、置放資料或取消作業。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the `Action` property of the event . 如果值為 `DragAction.Continue`，會引發 事件以繼續作業，並引發具有新效果的 事件，以設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標時，使用者便會獲得滑鼠位置的最新回應。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up-to-date feedback about the mouse position. 如果值為 `DragAction.Drop`，置放效果值就會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式即可在來源資料中執行適當作業，例如，如果作業是移動時則剪下資料。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果值為 `DragAction.Cancel`，則會引發 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 取得設計工具標題區域的高度。

span.span: Gets the height of the title area of the designer.

value.span: 設計工具標題區域的高度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The height in pixels of the title area of the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會描述設計工具標題區域的高度。The describes the height of the title area of the designer. 一般來說，這可能包含標題、圖示和展開或摺疊按鈕。Typically this can contain the heading, icon, and expand or collapse button.
